Hymn.Arabic:
يا كُلُّ الصُفُوفِ السَمَائِيينْ،
رَتِّلُوا لإلَهِنَا بِنَغَمَاتِ التَسْبِيحْ
وإبْتَهِجُوا مَعَنَا اليَوْمَ فَرِحِينْ،
بِقِيَامَةِ السَيِّدِ المَسِيحْ.
Hymn.English:
All you heavenly orders,
Sing to our God with the melody of praise,
Rejoice with us today with gladness,
In the Resurrection of the Lord Christ.
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Ya kol al sofoof al sama-eyeen, 
 ratelo le-eelahena be naghamat el-tasbeeh, 
  wabe-tahegoo ma3na al-yowma fare7een, 
  be-qeyamat El-Sayed El-Masee7.

Hymn.Arabic:
اليَوْمَ قَدْ كَمَلَتِ النُبُوَاتْ،
وقَدْ تَمَّتْ أقْوَالُ الآبَاءِ الأوَّلِينْ،
بِقِيَامَةِ الرَّبِّ من بَيْنِ الأمْوَاتْ،
وهُوَ بَدْءُ المُضْطَجِعِينْ.
Hymn.English:
Today the prophecies are fulfilled,
And the sayings of the forefathers are realized,
By the Resurrection of the Lord from among the dead,
He is the first-fruit of those who have fallen asleep.
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Al-yowma qud kamalat el-nobowat,
 wa qad tamat akwalol-aba2 el-awaleen,
 be qeyamat El-Rabe men baynel-amwat, 
 wa howa bad2ol mod-tage3een.

Hymn.Arabic:
قَدْ قَامَ الرَّبُّ مِثْلُ النَائِمْ،
وكَالثَمِلِ من اَلخَمَرَة،
ووَهَبَنَا النَعِيمَ الدَائِمْ،
وعَتَقْنَا مِنْ اَلعُبُودِيَّة المُرَّة.
Hymn.English:
The Lord arose as one who sleeps,
And as one who is sated with wine,
He has granted us the everlasting joy,
And freed us from bitter bondage.
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Qad qam al-Rabo methlol-na2em, 
 wa kal sa-mely men al-kamra, 
 wa wahabana al-na-3eemol da2em, 
 wa 3atakna men al-3obodeyatel-mora.

Hymn.Arabic:
وسَبَى اَلجَحِيمَ سَبْيَاً،
وحَطَّمَ أبْوَابَهُ النُحَاسْ،
وكَسَّرَ مَتَارِيسَهُ الحَدِيدَ كَسْرَاً،
وأبْدَلَ لَنَا العُقُوبَةَ بِالخَلاصْ.
Hymn.English:
He led Hades captive,
And crushed the brass doors,
He utterly broke the bars of iron,
And for us, exchanged punishment for salvation.
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Wa sabal-ga7ima sabian, 
 wa 7atama abwa-bahol-no7as, 
 wa qassar mataresahol-7adida kasran, 
 wa abda la lanal-3oqobata bel-khalas.

Hymn.Arabic:
نُسَبِّحَهُ ونَزِيدْ رِفْعَتَهُ،
ونَعْتَرِفْ بِمَجْدِ قِيَامَتِهِ،
ونَشْكُرُهُ عَلَى عَظَيمِ نِعْمَتِهِ،
لأنَّ إلى الأبَدِ رَحْمَتِهِ.
Hymn.English:
We praise and increase His exaltation, 
 And confess the glory of His Resurrection, 
 We thank Him for His great grace, 
 For His mercy endures forever.
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Nosabe7a-ho wa nozedo ref3ataho, 
 wa na3taref be-magde qeya-matehe, 
 wa nash-koroho 3ala 3azeme ne3matehe, 
 le-an elal-abadee ra7-matehe.
